noun.description: Any plant of the (former) class Rhizocarpeae (now the family Marsileaceae) of aquatic and semiaquatic ferns; a marsileaceous plant.

origin: Mid 19th century; earliest use found in John Balfour (1808–1884), botanist. From rhizo- + -carp, after either scientific Latin Rhizocarpae or German Rhizokarp.
